flawed_nl_solution:
To move in, Janet had to pay 2 months worth of rent so that would cost 2*1250 = $<<2*1250=2500>>2500
On top of the rent she needed to pay a deposit of $500 so 2500+500 = $<<2500+500=30000>>30000 total to rent the apartment
If it cost $30000 to move in and she had $2225 then she need 30000-2225 = $<<30000-2225=27775>>27775 more
#### 27775

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 3000, not 30000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
